verses.text: And the Spirit of God came upon Azariah the son of Oded :

And he went out to meet Asa , and said unto him, Hear ye me, Asa , and all Judah and Benjamin ; The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* with you, while ye be with him; and if ye seek him, he will be found of you; but if ye forsake him, he will forsake you.\f + \fr 15.2 \ft to meet…: Heb. before Asa\f*
Now for a long season Israel \add hath been\add* without the true God , and without a teaching priest , and without law.
But when they in their trouble did turn unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel , and sought him, he was found of them.
And in those times \add there was\add* no peace to him that went out , nor to him that came in , but great vexations \add were\add* upon all the inhabitants of the countries.
And nation was destroyed of nation , and city of city : for God did vex them with all adversity.\f + \fr 15.6 \ft destroyed: Heb. beaten in pieces\f*
Be ye strong therefore, and let not your hands be weak : for your work shall be rewarded. \p

And when Asa heard these words , and the prophecy of Oded the prophet , he took courage , and put away the abominable idols out of all the land of Judah and Benjamin , and out of the cities which he had taken from mount Ephraim , and renewed the altar of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, that \add was\add* before the porch of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 15.8  t abominable…: Heb. abominations *

And he gathered all Judah and Benjamin , and the strangers with them out of Ephraim and Manasseh , and out of Simeon : for they fell to him out of Israel in abundance , when they saw that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* his God \add was\add* with him.
So they gathered themselves together at Jerusalem in the third month , in the fifteenth year of the reign of Asa.

And they offered unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* the same time , of the spoil \add which\add* they had brought , seven hundred oxen and seven thousand sheep.\f + \fr 15.11 \ft the same…: Heb. in that day\f*
And they entered into a covenant to seek the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of their fathers with all their heart and with all their soul ;
That whosoever would not seek the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* God of Israel should be put to death , whether small or great , whether man or woman.
And they sware unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with a loud voice , and with shouting , and with trumpets , and with cornets.

And all Judah rejoiced at the oath : for they had sworn with all their heart , and sought him with their whole desire ; and he was found of them: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* gave them rest round about. \p

¶ And also \add concerning\add* Maachah the mother of Asa the king , he removed her from \add being\add* queen , because she had made an idol in a grove : and Asa cut down her idol , and stamped \add it\add*, and burnt \add it\add* at the brook Kidron.\f + \fr 15.16 \ft mother: that is, grandmother\f*\f + \fr 15.16 \ft idol: Heb. horror\f*
But the high places were not taken away out of Israel : nevertheless the heart of Asa was perfect all his days. \p
¶ And he brought into the house of God the things that his father had dedicated , and that he himself had dedicated , silver , and gold , and vessels.
And there was no \add more\add* war unto the five and thirtieth year of the reign of Asa.
